name: Mixology
ingredients: Vodka, 2 Lemons, Honey, 1 Cucumber, Haribo (of choice), Ice
instructions: 1. Use a vegetable peeler to grate the cucumber into slices. Place into the side of the glass. 2. Cut the lemons in half and squeeze the juice into a cocktail shaker or meddling glass. 3. Mix in with a generous squeeze of honey. 4. Add ice into the shaker with one shot of vodka per person. 5. Mix well and then pour over ice into a glass.
